title: Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Premium Hand Protection from Welder and Cutting Torch Heat, Commercial Quality, Cotton Lined, Gauntlet Cuff, Unisex, Grey, One Size
descriptions: Protect your hands with confidence while welding with the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641. These premium gloves offer heavy-duty protection from heat, flame, and chemicals, making them ideal for MIG and stick welding. The gauntlet cuff design provides extra coverage and the cotton lining ensures comfort. With features like fully welted seams, lock-stitch construction, and a winged thumb design, these gloves are durable and built to last. Made from split cowhide grade A leather and cotton fleece, these gloves are high-quality and unisex. Get your hands on these gray gloves for superior hand protection during your welding projects.

Introducing the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 - the ultimate solution for premium hand protection from welder and cutting torch heat! These gloves are heavy duty, heat, flame, and chemical resistant, making them perfect for tough welding jobs. The fully welted seams and lock-stitch construction ensure durability, while the winged thumb design and Kevlar stitching material provide added flexibility and strength. 

Made from split cowhide grade A leather on the exterior and soft cotton fleece on the interior, these gloves are not only protective but also comfortable to wear. The gauntlet cuff style with a length of 13.5 inches offers extended coverage and safety. 

Suitable for MIG welding and stick welding applications, these gloves are a must-have for any professional welder. Designed to be unisex and available in one size, these gray gloves are as stylish as they are functional. Get your hands on the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 today and experience top-notch hand protection like never before!
